name: Submerged (itch) (Lucas van Leiden)
description:
Don't let the light go out.

WASD / arrow keys to move

Press SPACE to toggle light

Press E to drop a beacon

Press R to restart on Game Over

Out entry for Ludum Dare 48 - Theme: Deeper and deeper

Feel free to rate us and leave a comment! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/submerged

Font used:
Gameplay by  Geronimo Font Studios
